md:
giải nghĩa từ "escape" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Escape (verb) - trốn thoát, thoát khỏi
	+ Meaning: to get away from a place or situation, often in a hurry or secretly.
	+ Example: "The prisoner escaped from the jail by digging a tunnel."
* Escape (noun) - sự trốn thoát
	+ Meaning: an act of getting away from a place or situation.
	+ Example: "The escape from the burning building was a miracle."
* Escape (verb) - tránh, thoát khỏi
	+ Meaning: to avoid or get away from something unpleasant or difficult.
	+ Example: "I tried to escape the conversation by pretending to receive a phone call."

Từ liên quan:

* Escapade (noun) - sự phiêu lưu, mạo hiểm
* Escapism (noun) - sự trốn thoát khỏi thực tế
* Escapist (noun) - người trốn thoát khỏi thực tế

Note: In computing, "escape" can also refer to a special character or sequence of characters used to indicate that the following characters should be treated differently, such as in escaping special characters in a string.

  • Escape (verb) - trốn thoát, thoát khỏi
    • Meaning: to get away from a place or situation, often in a hurry or secretly.
    • Example: "The prisoner escaped from the jail by digging a tunnel."
  • Escape (noun) - sự trốn thoát
    • Meaning: an act of getting away from a place or situation.
    • Example: "The escape from the burning building was a miracle."
  • Escape (verb) - tránh, thoát khỏi
    • Meaning: to avoid or get away from something unpleasant or difficult.
    • Example: "I tried to escape the conversation by pretending to receive a phone call."

  • Escapade (noun) - sự phiêu lưu, mạo hiểm
  • Escapism (noun) - sự trốn thoát khỏi thực tế
  • Escapist (noun) - người trốn thoát khỏi thực tế

Note: In computing, "escape" can also refer to a special character or sequence of characters used to indicate that the following characters should be treated differently, such as in escaping special characters in a string.
